Package org.bluez

Interface Summary
Adapter The "Adapter" interface provides methods to access the local adapter(s).
BlueZAPI Abstraction interface to access BlueZ over D-Bus.
BlueZAPI.DeviceInquiryListener Receive device discovery events.
Error Errors thrown by hcid or any bluetooth service.
Manager This interface provides methods to list the available adapters, retrieve the default local adapter path and list/activate services.
 

Class Summary
BlueZAPIFactory Abstraction interface factory to access BlueZ over D-Bus Detect BlueZ D-Bus interface version and creates appropriate abstraction layer for JSR-82 implementation.
 

Exception Summary
Error.AlreadyConnected A connection request has been received on an already connected device.
Error.AlreadyExists One of the requested elements already exists Error returned if a record for a specific procedure already exists and it has been tried create a new one.
Error.AuthenticationCanceled Hcid specific Error (Can be thrown by hcid only)
Error.AuthenticationFailed Hcid specific Error (Can be thrown by hcid only)
Error.AuthenticationRejected Hcid specific Error (Can be thrown by hcid only)
Error.AuthenticationTimeout Hcid specific Error (Can be thrown by hcid only)
Error.Canceled The operation was canceled.
Error.ConnectionAttemptFailed An unexpected error (other than DeviceUnreachable) error has occurred while attempting a connection to a device.
Error.DeviceUnreachable The remote device is either powered down or out of range.
Error.DoesNotExist One of the requested elements does not exist Error returned if a record for a specific procedure doesn't exist.
Error.Failed This is a the most generic error.
Error.InProgress Error returned if an operation is in progress.
Error.InvalidArguments The DBUS request does not contain the right number of arguments with the right type, or the arguments are there but their value is wrong, or does not makes sense in the current context.
Error.NoSuchAdapter Error returned when the requested adapter doesn't exists.
Error.NoSuchService No Such Service.
Error.NotAuthorized Error returned when the caller of a method is not authorized.
Error.NotAvailable Error returned when a specified record is not available.
Error.NotConnected The remote device is not connected, while the method call would expect it to be, or is not in the expected state to perform the action.
Error.NotInProgress Not In Progress Hcid specific Error (Can be thrown by hcid only)
Error.NotReady Error returned when the adapter is DOWN.
Error.NotSupported The remote device does not support the expected feature.
Error.OutOfMemory Error returned when a memory allocation via malloc() fails.
Error.Rejected Rejected Hcid specific Error (Can be thrown by hcid only)
Error.RepeatedAttempts Hcid specific Error (Can be thrown by hcid only)
Error.RequestDeferred Hcid specific Error (Can be thrown by hcid only)
Error.UnknwownMethod This is an experimental method.
Error.UnsupportedMajorClass Unsupported Device Class Hcid specific Error (Can be thrown by hcid only)
